question: Who among the following was never the Lok Sabha Speaker?
explanation:
Hukum Singh (April 1962-March 1967), GS Dhillon (April 1969-Dec 1975), BaliramBhagat (Jan 1976-March 1977)
KalyanVaidyanathanKutturSundaram, also referred as K. V. K. Sundaram, was an Indian civil servant, who holds the record as the first Law Secretary of independent India and second Chief Election Commissioner of India. He also chaired the Fifth Law Commission of India for the period 1968â€“71.
